l10nSecondParagraph.message: If you need more complex localization, you can also define data-l10n-args. This should contain $containerType$ filled with $dataType$, which will be passed into Chrome's i18n API as $functionArgs$. In fact, this paragraph does just that, and wraps the args in mono-space font. Easy!
